scripts.copyfonts: copyfiles -f node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* dist/fonts && copyfiles fonts/* dist
scripts.usemin: usemin antecedents.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/antecedents.html && usemin assesorament.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/assesorament.html && usemin auditoria.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/auditoria.html && usemin codietic.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/codietic.html && usemin collaboracions.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/collaboracions.html && usemin contacta.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contacta.html && usemin cookies.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/cookies.html && usemin defense.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/defense.html && usemin denuncies.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/denuncies.html && usemin express.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/express.html && usemin formacio.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/formacio.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin pressupost.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/pressupost.html && usemin pressupostpetita.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/pressupostpetita.html && usemin prevencio.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/prevencio.html && usemin previsio.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/previsio.html && usemin privacy.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/privacy.html && usemin quisom.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/quisom.html && usemin serveis.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/serveis.html && usemin software.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/software.html
scripts.imagemin: imagemin img/* -o dist/img && imagemin img/bg/* -o dist/img/bg
scripts.build: npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
